binary_wiarchive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_BINARY_WIARCHIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BINARY_WIARCHIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // binary_wiarchive.hpp

00019 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00020 #ifdef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTREAMBUF
00021 #error "wide char i/o not supported on this platform"
00022 #else
00023 
00024 #include <istream> // wistream
00025 #include <boost/archive/binary_iarchive_impl.hpp>
00026 
00027 namespace boost { 
00028 namespace archive {
00029 
00030 // same as binary_wiarchive below - without the shared_ptr_helper
00031 class naked_binary_wiarchive : 
00032     public binary_iarchive_impl<
00033         boost::archive::naked_binary_wiarchive, 
00034         std::wistream::char_type, 
00035         std::wistream::traits_type
00036     >
00037 {
00038 public:
00039     naked_binary_wiarchive(std::wistream & is, unsigned int flags = 0) :
00040         binary_iarchive_impl<
00041             naked_binary_wiarchive, 
00042             std::wistream::char_type, 
00043             std::wistream::traits_type
00044         >(is, flags)
00045     {}
00046     naked_binary_wiarchive(std::wstreambuf & bsb, unsigned int flags = 0) :
00047         binary_iarchive_impl<
00048             naked_binary_wiarchive, 
00049             std::wistream::char_type, 
00050             std::wistream::traits_type
00051         >(bsb, flags)
00052     {}
00053 };
00054 
00055 } // namespace archive
00056 } // namespace boost
00057 
00058 // note special treatment of shared_ptr. This type needs a special
00059 // structure associated with every archive.  We created a "mix-in"
00060 // class to provide this functionality.  Since shared_ptr holds a
00061 // special esteem in the boost library - we included it here by default.
00062 #include <boost/archive/shared_ptr_helper.hpp>
00063 
00064 namespace boost { 
00065 namespace archive {
00066 
00067 class binary_wiarchive : 
00068     public binary_iarchive_impl<
00069         binary_wiarchive, std::wistream::char_type, std::wistream::traits_type
00070     >
00071 {
00072 public:
00073     binary_wiarchive(std::wistream & is, unsigned int flags = 0) :
00074         binary_iarchive_impl<
00075             binary_wiarchive, std::wistream::char_type, std::wistream::traits_type
00076         >(is, flags)
00077     {}
00078     binary_wiarchive(std::wstreambuf & bsb, unsigned int flags = 0) :
00079         binary_iarchive_impl<
00080             binary_wiarchive, std::wistream::char_type, std::wistream::traits_type
00081         >(bsb, flags)
00082     {}
00083 };
00084 
00085 } // namespace archive
00086 } // namespace boost
00087 
00088 // required by export
00089 BOOST_SERIALIZATION_REGISTER_ARCHIVE(boost::archive::binary_wiarchive)
00090 
00091 #endif // BOOST_NO_STD_WSTREAMBUF
00092 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BINARY_WIARCHIVE_HPP
